程序包 com.scintilla.group

类 Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scintilla.group.Group
  • public class Group
extends java.lang.Object
    A Group is a cache namespace and associated data loaded spread over.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      Group​(java.lang.String name, long cacheBytes, Groups groups, SourceDataGetter sourceDataGetter)
      Constructs a Group and put it in Groups map.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      ByteView get​(java.lang.String key)
      Get value for a key from cache.
      ByteView getFromPeer​(PeerGetter peerGetter, java.lang.String key)
      Use an httpGetter that implements the PeerGetter interface to get cached values from accessing remote nodes.
      ByteView load​(java.lang.String key)
      Loads key either by invoking the getter locally or by sending it to another machine.

      Registers a PeerPicker for choosing remote peer.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Group

        public Group​(java.lang.String name,
             long cacheBytes,
             Groups groups,
             SourceDataGetter sourceDataGetter)
        Constructs a Group and put it in Groups map.
        参数:
        name - Group name.
        cacheBytes - Cache size.
        sourceDataGetter - Getter callback func.
        groups - Group collection.

    • 方法详细资料

      • registerPeers

        public void registerPeers​(PeerPicker peerPicker)
        Registers a PeerPicker for choosing remote peer. Injects the HTTPPool that implements the PeerPicker interface into the Group.
        参数:
        peerPicker - The HTTPPool that implements the PeerPicker.

      • get

        public ByteView get​(java.lang.String key)
        Get value for a key from cache.
        参数:
        key - Cache key.
        返回:
        Byte view.

      • load

        public ByteView load​(java.lang.String key)
        Loads key either by invoking the getter locally or by sending it to another machine. Use the PickPeer() method to select the node and call getFromPeer() to get it from the remote if it is not a native node. If it is a native node or fails, fall back to getLocally().
        参数:
        key - cache key.
        返回:
        ByteView byte view.

      • getFromPeer

        public ByteView getFromPeer​(PeerGetter peerGetter,
                            java.lang.String key)
        Use an httpGetter that implements the PeerGetter interface to get cached values from accessing remote nodes.
        参数:
        peerGetter - an httpGetter that implements the PeerGetter interface .
        key - Cache key.
        返回:
        Cache value.
